scripts.start:bg: nohup env-cmd -f .env.dev react-scripts start > webfg-gm-app.log 2>&1 & echo $! > webfg-gm-app.pid
scripts.stop:bg: if [ -f webfg-gm-app.pid ]; then kill $(cat webfg-gm-app.pid) && rm webfg-gm-app.pid && echo 'Stopped server.'; else echo 'Server not running (no PID file)'; fi
scripts.restart:bg: npm run stop:bg && sleep 1 && npm run start:bg
scripts.deploy:prod: STACK_NAME=webfg-gm-app && npm run build:prod && sam deploy --stack-name ${STACK_NAME} --parameter-overrides Environment=prod DeploymentId=none --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --no-fail-on-empty-changeset && aws s3 sync build/ s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name ${STACK_NAME} --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`WebsiteBucketName`].OutputValue' --output text) --delete && CF_DIST_ID=$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name ${STACK_NAME} --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`CloudFrontDistributionId`].OutputValue' --output text) && if [ -n "${CF_DIST_ID}" ]; then aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id ${CF_DIST_ID} --paths "/*"; else echo 'Warning: Could not get CloudFront Distribution ID to create invalidation.'; fi
scripts.deploy:qa: DEPLOYMENT_ID=${DEPLOYMENT_ID:-none} && ID_SUFFIX=$(if [ "$DEPLOYMENT_ID" != "none" ]; then echo "$DEPLOYMENT_ID"; fi) && STACK_NAME=webfg-gm-app-qa${ID_SUFFIX} && npm run build && sam deploy --stack-name ${STACK_NAME} --parameter-overrides Environment=qa DeploymentId=${DEPLOYMENT_ID} --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --no-fail-on-empty-changeset && aws s3 sync build/ s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name ${STACK_NAME} --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`WebsiteBucketName`].OutputValue' --output text) --delete && CF_DIST_ID=$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name ${STACK_NAME} --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`CloudFrontDistributionId`].OutputValue' --output text) && if [ -n "${CF_DIST_ID}" ]; then aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id ${CF_DIST_ID} --paths "/*"; else echo 'Warning: Could not get CloudFront Distribution ID to create invalidation.'; fi
